data.title: 2024 Best Places to Live in Denton County, TX
meta_keywords: best places to live in Denton County
data.meta_description: Explore the best places to live in Denton County based on crime, public schools, cost of living, real estate, and local amenities.
data.text:

Flower Mound

Suburb of Dallas, TX ,

343 Niche users give it an average review of 4.2 stars.

Featured Review: Current Resident says Living in Flower Mound for the past five years has allowed me to explore many parts of the city. As a sophomore at Flower Mound High School, I have grown to appreciate the unique charm and beauty of... .
